text: Gordon Edgar "Gord" Downie (6 February 1964 - 17 October 2017) was a Canadian rock musician, writer, and occasional actor. He was the lead singer and lyricist for the Canadian rock band The Tragically Hip. He released five solo albums: Coke Machine Glow (2001), Battle of the Nudes (2003), The Grand Bounce (2010), And the Conquering Sun (2014) and Secret Path (2016). On the first three of these, he was backed by the Country of Miracles; Downie was diagnosed with glioblastoma, a rare form of brain cancer in May 2016. He died from the disease on 17 October 2017 in Toronto at the age of 53. ==References== Category:1964 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Deaths from glioblastoma Category:Cancer deaths in Canada Category:Canadian rock musicians Category:Musicians from Kingston, Ontario Category:Actors from Ontario Category:Writers from Ontario
